You can then load the package:

```{r }
library(EWCE)
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)
library(limma)
library(readxl)
theme_set(theme_cowplot())
```

```{r }
data("full_results")
data(ctd)
print(ewce.plot(full_results$results,mtc_method="BH",ctd=ctd)$withDendro)
```
